resources.string: Having squandered eight lives out of nine and scared to death of a bounty hunter wolf who came after him, Puss in Boots heeds the advice of a doctor and moves into the house of a local cat lady. There he resigns himself to the established order, grows a beard and loses his craving for exploits and adventures, but only until he learns about a magic map that points the way to a fallen Wish Star somewhere. Puss in Boots is determined to find the Star in order to get his life back, and in the company of a dog pretending to be a cat, he goes to steal a map from the famous collector of magical items, Jack Horner.
Hits that have stood the test of time
